summary: This is an email chain from August 23, 2019, between U.S. Attorney's Office (SDNY) staff discussing outreach from New Mexico regarding potential investigations into Jeffrey Epstein's properties in that state. The correspondence shows internal coordination on how to respond to the inquiry.

events.title: Inquiry about Epstein New Mexico Properties
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York receives an inquiry from New Mexico regarding whether they are investigating Epstein properties located there.

keyFacts: In August 2019, law enforcement in New Mexico reached out to the SDNY regarding potential investigations into Jeffrey Epstein's properties in New Mexico.
The email indicates internal coordination within the U.S. Attorney's Office on how to handle the inquiry, with plans to discuss it the following Monday.
The document shows ongoing investigative interest in Epstein's assets and properties following his arrest and death.
